headline: Is Autodesk (ADSK) Pricing Fair After Recent Share Price Swings And DCF Upside?
summary: If you are looking at Autodesk and wondering whether the current price really reflects what you are getting, you are not alone. This article is written to help you frame that value question clearly. Autodesk shares last closed at US$268.33, after a 4.2% gain over the past 7 days, even though the stock shows a 10.9% decline over 30 days and an 11.8% decline over 1 year, with a 20.8% return over 3 years and an 8.4% decline over 5 years. Recent market interest in Autodesk has been influenced by...

headline: Autodesk Sets Out Platform Priorities At Perform 2026 For Long-Term Moat
summary: Autodesk (NasdaqGS:ADSK) presented at Perform 2026, outlining its engineering and developer platform priorities. Senior engineering leaders discussed how Autodesk is shaping its software platforms for designers, engineers, and developers. The presentation highlighted the role of Autodesk's platforms in supporting digital design and engineering workflows. Autodesk, best known for software used in design, engineering, and construction, sits at the center of long running shifts toward digital...
